author: daxian-dbw
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1184.

- [x] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation][docs].

This PR addresses the side-by-side module path for PowerShell Core.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Commit f9171b478e6 is really big and I think the commit message doesn't accurately reflect what's in the commit.  Can you break it up into smaller commits, e.g. some of the commits look like they just change runtime tests to build time (#if UNIX).  Other changes introduce a new public api.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @lzybkr I have to change those runtime tests to build time because I enclosed `Platform.XDG_Type` and `Platform.SelectProductNameForDirectory` within `#if UNIX` when adding `XDG_Type.Shared_Modules` (they are public APIs but doesn't make sense in win-ops). I can break this commit into "code change", "test change" and "doc change" though.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: I see lots of opportunity and value in breaking up that commit - e.g. the change in analysiscache.cs has nothing to do with what's described in the PR or commit message.  It feels like maybe you introduced one specific change that necessitated touching more than intended - and that's where maybe you can split things up.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Got it. Will split up the commit to make it cleaner.
